title: How to Stay Warm Using Your Mind

steps.headline: Practice this trick frequently so that it works well for you.
Leave blankets, coats, long sleeves etc.
Close your eyes, and relax.
steps.description: This is where the "magic" warming begins...

steps.headline: Think of something warm.
steps.description: Do not think of something like hot cocoa. Think of something like the beach, or a hot shower.Thinking of the sun also helps a lot , Look up in the sky and imagine the sun .

steps.headline: Try not to think about the cold, no matter how cold it is.
Do this until you feel as if you are there, but not "out" there.
Keep trying.
steps.description: If you practice this enough, you might be able to physically warm your body using the power of suggestion and visualization.

text: Practice this trick frequently so that it works well for you.  Find a cold place.  Leave blankets, coats, long sleeves etc. behind. Close your eyes, and relax. This is where the "magic" warming begins... Think of something warm. Do not think of something like hot cocoa. Think of something like the beach, or a hot shower.Thinking of the sun also helps a lot , Look up in the sky and imagine the sun . Try not to think about the cold, no matter how cold it is.  Do this until you feel as if you are there, but not "out" there.  Keep trying. If you practice this enough, you might be able to physically warm your body using the power of suggestion and visualization.
